body: Upenyu analyses Zimbabwe's "Look East" policy: "When ZANU PF looks East I wonder what it is looking at. Is it examining the Chinese Communist Party’s successes and failures and how these may be instructional for them too?"
original_body: Upenyu analyses Zimbabwe's "Look East" policy: "When ZANU PF looks East I wonder what it is looking at. Is it examining the Chinese Communist Party’s successes and failures and how these may be instructional for them too?"
title: Zimbabwe: Myopic Look East Policy
